description: Celebrate Thanksgiving with an old-fashioned cocktail: Bourbon Negroni. This is a&nbsp;classic cocktail that will best suit the rich and spicy flavors of your favorite holiday dishes!
name: Bourbon Negroni

recipeInstructions.name: Combine infused bourbon, the digestif, and sweet vermouth in a mixing glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine infused bourbon, the digestif, and sweet vermouth in a mixing glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir for 90 seconds, and then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.
